actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 96-860.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H.R. 6464, to authorize the Secretary of the Army to convey to the Michigan Job Development Authority the lands and improvements comprising the Michigan Army Missile Plant in Sterling Heights, Macomb County, Michigan, in return for two new office buildings at the Detroit Arsenal, Warren, Michigan.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 6464 (Authorizing the Secretary of the Army to convey the Michigan Army Missile Plant in Sterling Heights, Michigan, to the Michigan Job Development Authority in return for office buildings at the Detroit Arsenal, Warren, Michigan).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H.R. 6464, to authorize the Secretary of the Army to convey to the Michigan Job Development Authority the lands and improvements comprising the Michigan Army Missile Plant in Sterling Heights, Macomb County, Michigan, in return for two new office buildings at the Detroit Arsenal, Warren, Michigan.
